a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.class: hp-social-inner ui-clear true true true false true

a.title: Go to comments for ACS Plan for Distance Learning

div.p: Previous minutes from past Board of Education meetings are posted on each agenda for board approval.

a.title: Go to comments for Stay Informed with Board Meetings

div.p: Do you follow/interact with ACS social media?

a.title: Go to comments for Stay Social With ACS
Go to comments for Child Nutrition Programs

div.class: hp-social-inner ui-clear true true true false true

span.p: Registration for Returning Students for the 2020-2021 academic school year closes on May 1, 2020, at 5:00 pm.
You will receive weekly Reminder emails during this open registration period with your SNAPCODE. We encourage you to complete registration within this open period.

p.a: Click here for Returning Student Registration for 2020-2021.

span.p: If you forgot your login information please use the Forgot Password or contact 334-887-2100. Remember you can also use a Cell Phone Number for account setup if you do not have an email. Please contact 334.887.2100 with registration questions.
Contact your child/children's school(s) if you need your SNAPCODE.

It is MANDATORY for any student that takes medication regularly at school to submit a Parent Authorization Form. Please download the School Medication Prescription/Parent Authorization Form and upload it with your registration or bring this form to your student's School.

a.title: Go to comments for Registration for Returning Students

span.strong: Registration for Kindergarten and New Students

span.p: Registration is open for kindergarten and students new to Auburn City Schools for the 2020-2021 Academic Year.
Only students who currently reside in Auburn may register online. NO returning students registrations will be accepted in the NEW student portal.
All future students not currently residing in Auburn should contact the Residency Office at 334-887-1906 for guidance.

p.a: Click here for New Student Registration for 2020-2021.

span.p: It is MANDATORY for any student that takes medication regularly at school to submit a Parent Authorization Form. Please download the School Medication Prescription/Parent Authorization Form and upload it with your registration or bring this form to your student's School.
**** Please do not register for preschool until you have received notification from the Little H.A.P.I.E. Tree preschool that your child has been accepted into the program.

a.title: Go to comments for Registration for Kindergarten and New Students

h2.span: Auburn City Schools 2028 Master Plan: Click HERE to Access PDF

span.p: In May 2018, the Board of Education approved Facility Plan 2028, a 10-year plan addressing the demolition, reconstruction and renovation of buildings and the impact of student growth on facilities capacity. Phase I of this plan, which began in the Fall 2018, includes the reconstruction and demolition of Cary Woods Elementary School and J. F. Drake Middle School, demolition and reconstruction of the gymnasium at East Samford School, and a new elementary school.

Facility Plan 2028 includes $172.33 million in estimated capital needs to complete the full implementation. These project will be funded with local funds from the City of Auburn 5 mill Capital Fund and the 16 mill Special School Tax funds. The school district continues to monitor student enrollment as it relates to the timing of projects from the master plan.

a.title: Go to comments for Auburn City Schools 2028 Master Plan

span.p: As Auburn City Schools prepares for the upcoming school year in 2019-2020, we want to assist those new to the school system or attending a school that is new to them.
Google Chrome is the recommended browser for using this tool.
Please click on the following link to type in your address and find your student's school location as well as directions to the school: Click here to find your school

span.strong: **Prior to enrolling all students that live on any Lee County Road must contact Auburn City Schools at 334-887-2100 to verify their address is inside the city limits.**

a.title: Go to comments for Find My School Location
